alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 16 at 2:16PM CDT until May 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN TEXAS AND OKLAHOMA PANHANDLES AND ALSO THE SOUTH CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron. In Texas...Dallam... Hartley...Oldham...Potter...Carson...Gray...Deaf Smith... Randall...Armstrong...Donley and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest to west 15 to 25 mph with gusts near 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 5 to 7 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...As high as 3 to 5. * Timing...Critical fire weather conditions between 2 PM and 9 PM Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
